name: Tesco Fajita Meal Kit 481G
description: Fajita meal kit containing 8 flour tortillas, spicy tomato salsa and fajita seasoning.
Kit contains: 8 Flour Tortillas, Spicy Tomato Salsa, Fajita Seasoning. Just Add: Chicken, Onion, Peppers Optional Soured Cream Guacamole Grated Cheese
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Preparation_Guidelines>To prepare fajitas you require:1 Tesco Fajitas kit;450g chicken breast fillets, cut into thin strips2 tbsp oil1 large red and green pepper, sliced1 large onion, slicedAdditional garnish (optional):Soured creamGuacamoleGrated cheeseStep oneCoat the chicken in the fajita seasoning and oil.Step twoHeat a heavy based frying pan until very hot and add chicken. Fry for about 3 minutes until browned. Add onion and peppers and cook for a further 3-4 minutes or until the chicken is cooked.Step threeRemove tortillas from the packaging and gently warm by microwaving on full power for 40 seconds (650W or Category B), 35 seconds (750W or Category D) or 30 seconds (850W or Category E) or by wrapping them in foil and placing on a baking tray in a pre-heated oven (150°C/300°F/Gas Mark 2) for 10 minutes.Step fourSpoon filling into the middle of a pre-heated tortilla, top with the salsa (plus additional garnish if desired).Step fiveWrap and serveTip: Don't overfill your tortilla or it won't fold properly!</Preparation_Guidelines></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Raising Agents (Disodium Diphosphate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Calcium Phosphate)
Emulsifiers (Mono- and Di-Glycerides of Fatty Acids)
PromotionDescription: 50 extra points on any Homepride pasta sauce, pasta bake or cooking sauce
